first_translate: right before  being sucked into darkness,
I managed to stop its advance...
even if only for just one moment.
could this mean that...
...I can control darkness?
but then another question arises.

hangle: 원작의 피오나는 어둠을 통제할 수 없었다.
first_translate: fiona from the novel couldn’t control darkness at all.
then why did I succeed when she didn’t?
after all, we share the same body and talents.
it’s no use thinking about it too much since there are no answers anyway.
my head hurts so badly.
mm! I’m stuffed!
lord relton must have been very grateful toward you.
this is quite a spread they’ve prepared for us today.
indeed.
hmm...
is something wrong?
you haven’t eaten much either.
I’m glad I came on this mission.
really? why?
well, because it turned out to be pretty productive.
the people here were nicer than expected as well.

hangle: 그 사람들, 목숨 빚을 졌다고 생각하고 있으니까…
first_translate: since those students think they owe their lives to me now,

hangle: 나중에 분명 호의적인 태도를 보일 거야.
first_translate: they’ll definitely treat me favorably later on.
and besides,
I found out that I’m more capable than I thought.
darkness...
controlling it wasn’t easy, but I still succeeded.

hangle: 분명 어둠 토벌에 엄청난 도움이 될 거야.
first_translate: that will surely help greatly during future battles against darkness.
do you plan on dealing with darkness again?
of course!
fiona.
fiona!
when his ice-cold hand touched mine,
it felt like my world was collapsing.
no need to comfort me.
I know you’re not happy about what happened,
but I’d hoped you would congratulate me instead of scolding me.
why?
promise me...
...that you won’t ever act like that again.
your actions were reckless and unreasonable.
still, I believe what I did was right.
I know.
there’s plenty of room for improvement.
as the person responsible for everyone present,
I believed that was the best thing to do back then.
yes, actually, you’re absolutely right.
you possess great power.

hangle: 가끔은 생존을 우선시해야 할 때가 있어.
first_translate: at times, survival needs to take precedence over everything else.

hangle: 그리고 어둠에 대한 정보는 너한테도 도움이 되잖아.
first_translate: on top of that, information regarding darkness could also benefit you.
that’s how I fought.
but--
so please don’t try to save others next time.
I told you already that I don’t want any help like that!

hangle: 억지를 써서라도 너를 잃고 싶지 않아…
first_translate: I refuse to lose you even if it kills me...
siegren...
if you really find this annoying,
then get angry instead of acting coldly!
you... idiot!
wait, fiona!
go away!
stop following me!
it’s not that...
uh... um...
or maybe some cookies or something.
I never had to console anyone before.
how old do you think I am?
forget about the snacks and go ahead without me.
what are you doing here?

hangle: 네가 울면서 창고로 도망치는데 어떻게 그냥 가나.
first_translate: how could I leave after seeing you run off crying?

hangle: 그런 소리를 다 할 줄 아네.
first_translate: look who talks.
...got into a fight with siegren.
it has something to do with darkness, doesn’t it?

hangle: 맞아. 내 행동은 충분히 옳았다고 생각하는데.
first_translate: yeah. I truly believe I acted appropriately though.

hangle: 시그렌이 괜히 말을 밉게 하는 거야.
first_translate: siegren’s just saying things he shouldn’t say.
I understand that he’s worried about me,
I should wipe away her tears...
no,
I guess that wouldn’t work...
fiona halyeon.
you’re such a good girl.
although you may have acted rashly, you showed responsibility.

hangle: 내 생각에도 네 판단이 객관적으로 옳았다.
first_translate: I agree that your decision was objectively correct.

hangle: 그러니 시그렌이 뭐라고 했든 별로 신경 쓰지 않았으면 좋겠어.
first_translate: thus, whatever siegren said, I hope you won’t let it bother you.
you deserve better than someone whose opinion makes you waver like this.
you deserve better than him.
